caption: Table 3: Test results of various models on MEDINST32. † indicates that the training sets of LLaMA3-MI includes the corresponding training sets of the datasets used by MEDINST32, whereas other models have not seen the MEDINST32 dataset. ↓ represents that a lower score is better, while for other metrics, a higher score is better. The best and second-best results for each row are highlighted in bold and underlined, respectively. For the baselines, we use a few-shot prompt, providing two examples in the instruction. For the fine-tuned models, we use a zero-shot prompt.
description: Table 3 presents the evaluation results of various models on the MEDINST32 benchmark, highlighting the performance of different models across various difficulty levels of tasks.
